channel.title: I don't know if this is a right place to post this, but can someone help?
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone knows how I can set up my phone (LG Ally, Android OS, Verizon) so it will let me connect to my computer via wifi. I want to be able to be far away from my home computer, and then I run an application on my phone and it will let me see what has been typed, downloaded, browsing history, etc. on my computer. Is there a way to set up my phone to connect to my computer and view these files no matter where I am as long as I have internet on my computer and phone?

item.title: I don't know if this is a right place to post this, but can someone help?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

This is the wrong section mate, general programming is for programming languages, you would want the general discussion board. Here you go mate http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,145.0.html

Read full topic
